title: Fully Furnished Apartment for Sale at King's Court
details:
This 1,400 sq ft apartment is fully-furnished and has 3 Bed Rooms, 2 Bathrooms, 2 Balconies, Living Room, Dining Room and Kitchen. Other features include a Rooftop Terrace, 24 hour security, Generator and a parking slot right next to the elevator. All Bedrooms and the Living room area have ACs.

On the border of Colombo 03 and in close proximity to Colombo 07, with easy access to Galle Road, Union Place, Rajagiriya, Kirulapone and Wellawatte. The central location places this apartment near leadings schools such as Royal College, Ladies College, St. Bridget's Convent, Wycherly International, Stafford International and Colombo International School. 500 m from Majestic City Shopping Center. Walking distance to Independence Square, Indepence Arcade and British Council. 5 mins drive to SSC and NCC. 5 mins to HSBC, Standard Chartered, and Bank of Ceylon, Commercial Bank.
